|powledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |connactled = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |spdledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |leddupcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimmin = <!-- Size of device {{convert/3 |length|x|width|x|height|in|mm}} {{convert/3 |length|x|width|x|height|mm|in}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|switch}} ==Overview== The 6x 4-port PHY IC's are covered by a difficult to remove heatsink but are likely Marvell 88E1543. :The 3x PoE control IC's and the SFP+ controller are likewise covered by heatsinks.
{{See also|Aerohive AH-SR2024P|Aerohive}}
===Specifications=== *Processor: [[Marvell]] 98DX4122 @800MHz CPU (ARMv5) *Flash/RAM: 1GB (SLC NAND) Flash, 512MB (DDR2) SDRAM *USB: 1x USB 2.0 Type A *128Gbps switching capacity, Rack mountable (1U, 19") *24x PoE+ Gigabit ports, 4x 10 Gigabit SFP+ slots *Up to 30W per port with a 408W total power budget
==Links of Interest== :[https://docs.aerohive.com/330000/docs/help/english/ng/Content/hardware/sr/sr2124p.htm User Guide]
==Pictures== <center>'''User Images''' <gallery mode="slideshow"> File:Aerohive AH-SR2124P Main board.jpeg|Main Board File:Aerohive AH-SR2124P Power Board.jpeg|Power Board File:Aerohive AH-SR2124P Internal View.jpeg|Internal View </gallery></center>[[Has images::internal| ]]
